data.text:
This image could have imperfections as it’s either historical or reportage.

MIAMI, FL - MAY 30: Adrianne Curry & Christopher Knight Split on Anniversary! Any couples celebrate wedded bliss on their anniversary but not so for Adrianne Curry and Christopher Knight! On their five-year anniversary yesterday, the model/actress and Brady Bunch star officially called it quits.Adrianne and Chris first met as housemates on The Surreal Life. Since romance bloomed, they quickly landed their own series, My Fair Brady which rolled cameras on their dating to engagement to first year of marriage.Unfortunately, it looks like the next chapter of their life is my fair separation. Their long-time friend and manager Phil Viardo told Hollyscoop, ÒActor Christopher Knight and his wife, model and television star Adrianne Curry have announced today on their five-year wedding anniversary that they are separating.Ó ÒAfter starting a relationship with what seemed to be irreconcilable differences, the couple has reached a period where those differences are no longer appreciated.Ó He added, ÒBoth Knight and Curry decided to release this joint announcement today in order to preempt any potential rumors and gossip and ask that their fans and the media respect their privacy during this delicate period.Ó . on May 30, 2011 in Miami, Florida People: Adrianne Curry_Christopher Knight
